name: subcss1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: ssc1(c0, c1, c2, cfv(chomf, c3), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c2, cxp(c0, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wfn(cfv(chomf, c3), cxp(c1, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c2, cxp(c0, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wfn(cfv(chomf, c3), cxp(c1, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(cfv(chomf, c3), cxp(c1, c1)))
-| wfn(cfv(chomf, c3), cxp(c1, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c2, cxp(c0, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)))
-| wfn(cfv(chomf, c3), cxp(c1, c1))

body.origin:
|- wfn(cfv(chomf, c3), cxp(c1, c1))
-| wceq(cfv(chomf, c3), cfv(chomf, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Homf ` c3)[Fn](c1 × c1)
⊣ (Homf ` c3)=(Homf ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c2, cxp(c0, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)))
-| wceq(cfv(chomf, c3), cfv(chomf, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c2[Fn](c0 × c0))
⊣ (w0 → c2[C_cat](Homf ` c3))
⊣ (Homf ` c3)=(Homf ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)))
-| wceq(cfv(chomf, c3), cfv(chomf, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c2[C_cat](Homf ` c3))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(Subcat ` c3))
⊣ (Homf ` c3)=(Homf ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c2, cxp(c0, c0)))
-| wceq(cfv(chomf, c3), cfv(chomf, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c2[Fn](c0 × c0))
⊣ (Homf ` c3)=(Homf ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(Subcat ` c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c2, cxp(c0, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)))

comment: The objects of a subcategory are a subset of the objects of the original. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
